definition: a large hemispherical brass or copper percussion instrument with a drumhead that can be tuned by adjusting the tension on it
details:
noun
- a large hemispherical brass or copper percussion instrument with a drumhead that can be tuned by adjusting the tension on it
= example: a large hemispherical brass or copper percussion instrument with a drumhead that can be tuned by adjusting the tension on it
= synonyms: kettle
